Class Melih_DatabaseConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • Melih_DatabaseConnection

  • public class Melih_DatabaseConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    This class facilitates database operations. The methods in it are called by the [Melih] class and serve to access and update the database. In creation of this class, codes and instruction in the following link have been utilized with modifications and additions: http://www.tutorialspoint.com/jdbc/jdbc-sample-code.htm The page was first accessed in 03.05.16.
    Since:
    2016-05-10
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Melih Barsbey

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean addData(Melih_Data myData)
      When called with a Melih_Data object containing emperor name and year, this method attempts to add this to the database.
      static boolean addSave(java.lang.String mySavedEmperors)
      When called with a String object containing the names of the last added emperors, this method adds this save to the database.
      static boolean clearSaveHistory()
      When called, this method clears the table 'melih_save'
      static boolean createDatabase()
      When called, this method creates a database called 'melih_database' when called.
      static boolean createDataTable()
      When called, this method creates the table 'melih_data' with three columns.
      static boolean createSaveTable()
      When called, this method creates the table 'melih_save' with two columns.
      static boolean dropDatabase()
      When called, this method drops the database if it already exists.
      static java.util.ArrayList<Melih_Data> getData()
      When called, all emperor names, ascension years, and marking information are returned to the user in an array of Melih_Data objects.
      static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getSave()
      When called, all save information is returned to the user in a string array
      static java.util.ArrayList<Melih_Data> makeQuery(java.lang.Integer queriedYear)
      When called with a year, this method checks if there are any emperors who ascended at that given year and returns their name(s) if there are any.
      static boolean orderTable()
      When called, this method orders the table according to the data of ascension
      static boolean saveData(Melih_Data myData)
      When called, this method marks the emperor held in the myData object as saved.
      static boolean unsaveSaved()
      When called, this method lifts the marks of all emperors, marking them all as unsaved.
      static boolean useDatabase()
      When called, this method selects the database 'melih_database' to be used.

      • Melih_DatabaseConnection

        public Melih_DatabaseConnection()

    • Method Detail

      • dropDatabase

        public static boolean dropDatabase()
        When called, this method drops the database if it already exists.
        Returns:
        boolean Whether the action succeeded or not.

      • createDatabase

        public static boolean createDatabase()
        When called, this method creates a database called 'melih_database' when called.
        Returns:
        boolean Whether the action succeeded or not.

      • useDatabase

        public static boolean useDatabase()
        When called, this method selects the database 'melih_database' to be used.
        Returns:
        boolean Whether the action succeeded or not.

      • createDataTable

        public static boolean createDataTable()
        When called, this method creates the table 'melih_data' with three columns. This table holds the data obtained from Wikidata.org.
        Returns:
        boolean Whether the action succeeded or not.

      • createSaveTable

        public static boolean createSaveTable()
        When called, this method creates the table 'melih_save' with two columns. One is an auto-incrementing save ID, whereas the other is a string that includes the name of the emperors that are added to the saved emperors within a given batch.
        Returns:
        boolean Whether the action succeeded or not.

      • clearSaveHistory

        public static boolean clearSaveHistory()
        When called, this method clears the table 'melih_save'
        Returns:
        boolean Whether the action succeeded or not.

      • orderTable

        public static boolean orderTable()
        When called, this method orders the table according to the data of ascension
        Returns:
        boolean Whether the action succeeded or not.

      • saveData

        public static boolean saveData(Melih_Data myData)
        When called, this method marks the emperor held in the myData object as saved.
        Parameters:
        myData - This parameter holds the name of the emperor and his date of ascension to be marked as saved.
        Returns:
        boolean Whether the action succeeded or not.

      • unsaveSaved

        public static boolean unsaveSaved()
        When called, this method lifts the marks of all emperors, marking them all as unsaved.
        Returns:
        boolean Whether the action succeeded or not.

      • makeQuery

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Melih_Data> makeQuery(java.lang.Integer queriedYear)
        When called with a year, this method checks if there are any emperors who ascended at that given year and returns their name(s) if there are any.
        Parameters:
        queriedYear - This is the year the user queried.
        Returns:
        data The emperors whose year of ascension matches the user's query year are in this array

      • addData

        public static boolean addData(Melih_Data myData)
        When called with a Melih_Data object containing emperor name and year, this method attempts to add this to the database. It returns true if it successfully does so. It returns false if it has not succeeded doing so (e.g. because of a replicate emperor name)
        Parameters:
        myData - This is the Melih_Data object holding a name, year, and information about whether the emperor is marked for later review
        Returns:
        boolean Whether the action succeeded or not.

      • addSave

        public static boolean addSave(java.lang.String mySavedEmperors)
        When called with a String object containing the names of the last added emperors, this method adds this save to the database.
        Parameters:
        mySavedEmperors - This string includes the latest batch of saved emperors
        Returns:
        boolean Whether the action succeeded or not.

      • getData

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Melih_Data> getData()
        When called, all emperor names, ascension years, and marking information are returned to the user in an array of Melih_Data objects.
        Returns:
        data This Melih_Data array includes all the emperor information.

      • getSave

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getSave()
        When called, all save information is returned to the user in a string array
        Returns:
        myEmperors This string array includes all the emperor name saving history.
